item.description:
This will be a holiday party to cap a truly extraordinary year. Lots of food, fun, surprises -- and, of course, gifts to each others. Newcomers heartily welcomed.

Check out the Message Board to sign up for our Holiday Goodie Bag Exchange! As always, activities are optional; but we strongly encourage everyone who comes to participate in this one: it's low cost, and low stress...and lots of fun!! See details in the sign-up thread.

There's a sign up too for the potluck luncheon, which is already shaping up to be a real feast!


LAST CALL FOR GOODIE BAG SIGN-UPS... PLEASE check the message boards for updates on our happy holiday doings, and to sign up if you haven't already. THANKS, ALL!
item.how_to_find_us: Blonde hair, glasses, name tag -- and maybe a lime-green bullhorn

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: December Holiday Meetup, starting at noon--stay tuned for details!
